mapper.insert: insert ignore into f_blockchain_contract (id, addr, ctype, `name`, decimals, abi, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{decimals,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{abi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
